Text: Usually I HATE rar files, but I thought I'd give this a go. But since the another version of this I downloaded from elsewhere was corrupt, I thought I'd give this a try. Sadly, this doesn't work either!! It will not unzip properly and after unzipping I tried to play it anyway on three different media players - no go. Please re-upload this and if you can do it in any other format besides mkv that would be appreciated.

thanks for all the great shows sceneline.

the rar/mkv's are working fine for me.

please continue to do time team episodes (HD pref), no one else is doing them. thank you!
